desc.en: Gehenna's Prefect Team declares their intent to arrest the members of Problem Solver 68. The Foreclosure Task Force prepares for battle, rebutting that Gehenna Academy has no authority to make such an arrest on Abydos territory.
desc.jp: Gehenna's Prefect Team declares their intent to arrest the members of Problem Solver 68. The Foreclosure Task Force prepares for battle, rebutting that Gehenna Academy has no authority to make such an arrest on Abydos territory.
desc.thai: Gehenna's Prefect Team declares their intent to arrest the members of Problem Solver 68. The Foreclosure Task Force prepares for battle, rebutting that Gehenna Academy has no authority to make such an arrest on Abydos territory.
desc.ko: Gehenna's Prefect Team declares their intent to arrest the members of Problem Solver 68. The Foreclosure Task Force prepares for battle, rebutting that Gehenna Academy has no authority to make such an arrest on Abydos territory.
desc.zh_tw: 格黑娜風紀委員會表明，自己的目的是來抓便利屋的問題學生。然而對策委員會學生卻反駁說，其他學園的風紀委員會在阿拜多斯高中自治區活動實屬越權，以此與格黑娜風紀委員會針鋒相對。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 格黑娜风纪委员会表明，自己的目的是来抓便利屋的问题学生。然而对策委员会学生却反驳说，其他学园的风纪委员会在阿拜多斯高中自治区活动实属越权，以此与格黑娜风纪委员会针锋相对。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 格黑娜风纪委员会表明，自己的目的是来抓便利屋的问题学生。然而对策委员会学生却反驳说，其他学园的风纪委员会在阿拜多斯高中自治区活动实属越权，以此与格黑娜风纪委员会针锋相对。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 格黑娜风纪委员会表明，自己的目的是来抓便利屋的问题学生。然而对策委员会学生却反驳说，其他学园的风纪委员会在阿拜多斯高中自治区活动实属越权，以此与格黑娜风纪委员会针锋相对。

desc.en: Despite being outnumbered, the Foreclosure Task Force is victorious with Sensei's guidance. After the battle, the senior administrator of Gehenna's Prefect Team, Ako, steps in to mediate. Meanwhile, Haruka hatches a conspiracy.
desc.jp: Despite being outnumbered, the Foreclosure Task Force is victorious with Sensei's guidance. After the battle, the senior administrator of Gehenna's Prefect Team, Ako, steps in to mediate. Meanwhile, Haruka hatches a conspiracy.
desc.thai: Despite being outnumbered, the Foreclosure Task Force is victorious with Sensei's guidance. After the battle, the senior administrator of Gehenna's Prefect Team, Ako, steps in to mediate. Meanwhile, Haruka hatches a conspiracy.
desc.ko: Despite being outnumbered, the Foreclosure Task Force is victorious with Sensei's guidance. After the battle, the senior administrator of Gehenna's Prefect Team, Ako, steps in to mediate. Meanwhile, Haruka hatches a conspiracy.
desc.zh_tw: 格黑娜風紀委員會雖然佔有數量上的優勢，結果還是不敵老師所指揮的對策委員會學生，最後以戰敗收場。戰鬥一結束，格黑娜風紀委員會的資深行政官亞子出面調解，而遙香則趁機開始策劃某種陰謀。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 格黑娜风纪委员会虽然占有数量上的优势，结果还是不敌老师所指挥的对策委员会学生，最后以战败收场。战斗一结束，格黑娜风纪委员会的资深行政官亚子出面调解，而遥香则趁机开始策划某种阴谋。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 格黑娜风纪委员会虽然占有数量上的优势，结果还是不敌老师所指挥的对策委员会学生，最后以战败收场。战斗一结束，格黑娜风纪委员会的资深行政官亚子出面调解，而遥香则趁机开始策划某种阴谋。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 格黑娜风纪委员会虽然占有数量上的优势，结果还是不敌老师所指挥的对策委员会学生，最后以战败收场。战斗一结束，格黑娜风纪委员会的资深行政官亚子出面调解，而遥香则趁机开始策划某种阴谋。

desc.en: The Prefect Team took down the Problem Solver 68 successfully, yet it arose the dissatisfaction of Abydos. As the other party was operating in Abydos without proper permission, such actions could be seen as ignoring authority. Everyone decided to engage.
desc.jp: The Prefect Team took down the Problem Solver 68 successfully, yet it arose the dissatisfaction of Abydos. As the other party was operating in Abydos without proper permission, such actions could be seen as ignoring authority. Everyone decided to engage.

desc.zh_tw: 風紀委員會成功放倒了便利屋68一行人，但卻引來了阿拜多斯一行人的不滿。由於對方未經授權在阿拜多斯境內活動，有無視許可權之疑，眾人決定迎戰。

desc.zh_cn_tw: 风纪委员会成功放倒了便利屋68一行人，但却引来了阿拜多斯一行人的不满。由于对方未经授权在阿拜多斯境内活动，有无视权限之疑，众人决定迎战。

desc.en: Aru grapples with her feelings after realizing that the ones who treated her to a bowl of ramen were actually Abydos students. She resolves anew to attack Abydos High School with her hired guns.
desc.jp: Aru grapples with her feelings after realizing that the ones who treated her to a bowl of ramen were actually Abydos students. She resolves anew to attack Abydos High School with her hired guns.
desc.thai: Aru grapples with her feelings after realizing that the ones who treated her to a bowl of ramen were actually Abydos students. She resolves anew to attack Abydos High School with her hired guns.
desc.ko: Aru grapples with her feelings after realizing that the ones who treated her to a bowl of ramen were actually Abydos students. She resolves anew to attack Abydos High School with her hired guns.
desc.zh_tw: 亞瑠後來才知道招待自己吃拉麵的對象是阿拜多斯高中的學生。亞瑠被罪惡感煎熬好一陣子，但還是馬上狠下心，動員人手前去攻擊阿拜多斯高中。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 阿露后来才知道招待自己吃拉面的对象是阿拜多斯高中的学生。阿露被罪恶感煎熬好一阵子，但还是马上狠下心，动员人手前去攻击阿拜多斯高中。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 亚瑠后来才知道招待自己吃拉面的对象是阿拜多斯高中的学生。亚瑠被罪恶感煎熬好一阵子，但还是马上狠下心，动员人手前去攻击阿拜多斯高中。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 亚瑠后来才知道招待自己吃拉面的对象是阿拜多斯高中的学生。亚瑠被罪恶感煎熬好一阵子，但还是马上狠下心，动员人手前去攻击阿拜多斯高中。

desc.en: Thanks to the work of the Foreclosure Task Force, Aru and Problem Solver are forced to withdraw.
desc.jp: Thanks to the work of the Foreclosure Task Force, Aru and Problem Solver are forced to withdraw.

desc.zh_tw: 多虧對策委員會學生們大展身手，才使得亞瑠和便利屋職員們戰敗後逃之夭夭。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 多亏对策委员会学生们大展身手，才使得阿露和便利屋职员们战败后逃之夭夭。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 多亏对策委员会学生们大展身手，才使得亚瑠和便利屋职员们战败后逃之夭夭。

desc.en: It was not until the departure with the Abydos did Aru realize their identity with the help from other members. Though conflicted in heart, Aru was determined to launch the attack at last.
desc.jp: It was not until the departure with the Abydos did Aru realize their identity with the help from other members. Though conflicted in heart, Aru was determined to launch the attack at last.

desc.zh_tw: 直到與阿拜多斯一行人告別之後，剩下的成員們才提醒亞瑠他們的身份。雖然內心糾結，亞瑠最後還是下定決心發起了進攻。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 直到与阿拜多斯一行人告别之后，剩下的成员们才提醒阿露他们的身份。虽然内心纠结，阿露最后还是下定决心发起了进攻。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 直到与阿拜多斯一行人告别之后，剩下的成员们才提醒亚瑠他们的身份。虽然内心纠结，亚瑠最后还是下定决心发起了进攻。

desc.en: Aru is waiting for a loan interview at the Stygian Bank when the masked members of the Foreclosure Task Force burst in and steal all the bank's money. The Black Market Guard gives chase, and Aru admires the students' act of pure villainy.
desc.jp: Aru is waiting for a loan interview at the Stygian Bank when the masked members of the Foreclosure Task Force burst in and steal all the bank's money. The Black Market Guard gives chase, and Aru admires the students' act of pure villainy.

desc.zh_tw: 亞瑠在暗黑銀行等著貸款審查，此時蒙面的對策委員會學生們出現在她面前把現金偷走。黑市保鑣緊追在對策委員會一行人身後。亞瑠對對策委員會學生讓自己看見的壞蛋的真面目投以充滿憧憬的目光。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 阿露在暗黑银行等着贷款审查，此时蒙面的对策委员会学生们出现在她面前把现金偷走。黑市保镳紧追在对策委员会一行人身后。阿露对对策委员会学生让自己看见的坏蛋的真面目投以充满憧憬的目光。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 亚瑠在暗黑银行等着贷款审查，此时蒙面的对策委员会学生们出现在她面前把现金偷走。黑市保镳紧追在对策委员会一行人身后。亚瑠对对策委员会学生让自己看见的坏蛋的真面目投以充满憧憬的目光。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 亚瑠在暗黑银行等着贷款审查，此时蒙面的对策委员会学生们出现在她面前把现金偷走。黑市保镳紧追在对策委员会一行人身后。亚瑠对对策委员会学生让自己看见的坏蛋的真面目投以充满憧憬的目光。

desc.en: The Abydos threatened the staff to hand out the records, and accidentally took out 100-million-worth money. Aru was greatly amazed by the side; other members were just chilling there. After the robbery, the security called for the Black Market guards, and everyone began to engage.

desc.zh_tw: 阿拜多斯一行人威脅工作人員交出了記錄，順便把一億日元的資金給拿了出來。亞瑠在旁邊大為震撼，極為讚歎；其他成員在旁邊靜靜觀察。搶完後，銀行保安叫來了黑市守衛，眾人隨即開始作戰。

desc.en: Unaware of Aru's true feelings, the Foreclosure Task Force blame Aru for the heinous atrocity she accidentally caused. Eventually, Aru ends up confronting the team, pretending to be the villain they believe she is.
desc.jp: Unaware of Aru's true feelings, the Foreclosure Task Force blame Aru for the heinous atrocity she accidentally caused. Eventually, Aru ends up confronting the team, pretending to be the villain they believe she is.
desc.thai: Unaware of Aru's true feelings, the Foreclosure Task Force blame Aru for the heinous atrocity she accidentally caused. Eventually, Aru ends up confronting the team, pretending to be the villain they believe she is.
desc.ko: Unaware of Aru's true feelings, the Foreclosure Task Force blame Aru for the heinous atrocity she accidentally caused. Eventually, Aru ends up confronting the team, pretending to be the villain they believe she is.
desc.zh_tw: 無意中犯下慘無人道的暴行的亞瑠。對策委員會的學生沒明白亞瑠的內心就指責她。結果亞瑠真的模仿壞蛋與對策委員會對立。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 无意中犯下惨无人道的暴行的阿露。对策委员会的学生没明白阿露的内心就指责她。结果阿露真的模仿坏蛋与对策委员会对立。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 无意中犯下惨无人道的暴行的亚瑠。对策委员会的学生没明白亚瑠的内心就指责她。结果亚瑠真的模仿坏蛋与对策委员会对立。

desc.en: During the climax of the battle between Problem Solver and Foreclosure Task Force, the combatants are suddenly shelled from afar. Ayane announces that the cannons were fired by Gehenna Academy's Prefect Team.

desc.zh_tw: 就在便利屋和對策委員會的戰鬥達到最高潮時，砲擊突然從遠方襲來。綾音說發動砲擊的是格黑娜學園的風紀委員會。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 就在便利屋和对策委员会的战斗达到最高潮时，砲击突然从远方袭来。绫音说发动砲击的是格黑娜学园的风纪委员会。

desc.en: Haruka blew up the restaurant at the confusing speech delivered by Aru, which even made Mutsuki started blaming her. Upon arrival, the Foreclosure Task Force was even more furious when they discovered the evil doer. They started the battle immediately.

desc.en: After defeating the Helmet Gang, the Foreclosure Task Force introduce themselves to Sensei at Abydos High School. Having solved some supply issues with Sensei's help, the students want to use their momentum to crush the Helmet Gang's outpost.
desc.jp: After defeating the Helmet Gang, the Foreclosure Task Force introduce themselves to Sensei at Abydos High School. Having solved some supply issues with Sensei's help, the students want to use their momentum to crush the Helmet Gang's outpost.

desc.zh_tw: 擊敗頭盔團重返阿拜多斯高中的對策委員會學生們，再次向老師自我介紹。在老師的幫助下，學校的補給問題已順利解決，這讓學生們非常開心。大夥們想趁勢破壞片方頭盔團的前哨基地。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 击败头盔团重返阿拜多斯高中的对策委员会学生们，再次向老师自我介绍。在老师的帮助下，学校的补给问题已顺利解决，这让学生们非常开心。大伙们想趁势破坏片方头盔团的前哨基地。

desc.en: Aru grapples with the thought of using funds acquired by the Foreclosure Task Force to attack Abydos High School. To lift her spirits, Problem Solver takes her to get Shiba Seki ramen. Meanwhile, a man in a black suit appears before Hoshino with a clandestine proposal.
desc.jp: Aru grapples with the thought of using funds acquired by the Foreclosure Task Force to attack Abydos High School. To lift her spirits, Problem Solver takes her to get Shiba Seki ramen. Meanwhile, a man in a black suit appears before Hoshino with a clandestine proposal.

desc.ko: Aru grapples with the thought of using funds acquired by the Foreclosure Task Force to attack Abydos High School. To lift her spirits, Problem Solver takes her to get Shiba Seki ramen. Meanwhile, a man in a black suit appears before Hoshino with a clandestine proposal.
desc.zh_tw: 亞瑠用向對策委員會成員取得的錢攻擊阿拜多斯高中。對此，亞瑠感到良心的譴責而苦惱不斷。為了鼓勵無精打采的亞瑠，便利屋職員們一同前往柴關拉麵店。另一方面，身穿黑色西装的男人出現在星野面前，向她提出秘密交易。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 阿露用向对策委员会成员取得的钱攻击阿拜多斯高中。对此，阿露感到良心的谴责而苦恼不断。为了鼓励无精打采的阿露，便利屋职员们一同前往柴关拉面店。另一方面，身穿黑色西装的男人出现在星野面前，向她提出秘密交易。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 亚瑠用向对策委员会成员取得的钱攻击阿拜多斯高中。对此，亚瑠感到良心的谴责而苦恼不断。为了鼓励无精打采的亚瑠，便利屋职员们一同前往柴关拉面店。另一方面，身穿黑色西装的男人出现在星野面前，向她提出秘密交易。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 亚瑠用向对策委员会成员取得的钱攻击阿拜多斯高中。对此，亚瑠感到良心的谴责而苦恼不断。为了鼓励无精打采的亚瑠，便利屋职员们一同前往柴关拉面店。另一方面，身穿黑色西装的男人出现在星野面前，向她提出秘密交易。

desc.en: Aru was worried all night about another attack against Abydos. Haruka already set the bombs in place. Mutsuki didn't understand why Aru didn't take the money first, and Aru expressed her concern on being interfering too much by the customer.
desc.jp: Aru was worried all night about another attack against Abydos. Haruka already set the bombs in place. Mutsuki didn't understand why Aru didn't take the money first, and Aru expressed her concern on being interfering too much by the customer.

desc.zh_tw: 亞瑠一整晚對再戰阿拜多斯一行人而擔憂，遙香則佈置好了炸彈。無月不解為什麼亞瑠不先收錢辦事，亞瑠則說是怕被顧客干涉太多。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 阿露一整晚对再战阿拜多斯一行人而担忧，遥香则布置好了炸弹。睦月不解为什么阿露不先收钱办事，阿露则说是怕被顾客干涉太多。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 亚瑠一整晚对再战阿拜多斯一行人而担忧，遥香则布置好了炸弹。无月不解为什么亚瑠不先收钱办事，亚瑠则说是怕被顾客干涉太多。

desc.en: Someone purposed to get back to Gehenna, yet by Kayoko's careful analysis, the existence of the Prefect Team, especially Hina, would make them impossible to win and therefore impractical to go back.

desc.zh_tw: 中間有人提出了回到格黑娜的選項，但佳代子謹慎分析了形勢，認為由於有風紀委員會，尤其是陽奈的存在，他們幾乎沒有勝算，回去其實挺不實際的。

desc.zh_cn_cn: 中间有人提出了回到格黑娜的选项，但佳代子谨慎分析了形势，认为由于有风纪委员会，尤其是阳奈的存在，他们几乎没有胜算，回去其实挺不实际的。

desc.en: Shiroko rescues Sensei and eventually the two arrive at Abydos' Foreclosure Task Force club room. Soon after, the school is attacked by the Kata-Kata Helmet Gang, and Sensei teams up with the students to fight back.

desc.zh_tw: 老師被白子救出來後，抵達阿拜多斯高中的廢校對策委員會社團活動室。然而當時片方頭盔團卻來攻擊阿拜多斯高中， 於是老師就和學生們一起出面擊退他們。

desc.zh_tw: 凱薩理事對這意想不到的狀況非常氣憤。而老師則指揮對策委員會和便利屋學生對抗PMC士兵。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 凯萨理事对这意想不到的状况非常气愤。而老师则指挥对策委员会和便利屋学生对抗PMC士兵。

desc.en: The PMC forces finally retreat following an arduous battle. Later, Sensei seeks out Black Suit personally to negotiate Hoshino's return.

desc.zh_tw: 混戰結束後PMC士兵撤退。老師為了尋找解救星野的方法，直接去找黑色西裝人。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 混战结束后PMC士兵撤退。老师为了寻找解救星野的方法，直接去找黑色西装人。

desc.en: The director was both shocked and angry to see that the Problem Solver 68 betrayed them, but the latter insulted them back. Sensei confronted the director, demanding that Hoshino be returned. The director didn't step back. Everyone was forced to engage the enemies..
desc.jp: The director was both shocked and angry to see that the Problem Solver 68 betrayed them, but the latter insulted them back. Sensei confronted the director, demanding that Hoshino be returned. The director didn't step back. Everyone was forced to engage the enemies..

desc.zh_tw: 理事對便利屋68背叛他們又驚又怒，但便利屋一行人予以了回敬。老師對峙理事，要求將星野還回來，但後者並未讓步。不得已，一行人繼續應戰。

desc.zh_tw: 他們遇到的敵人就是凱薩PMC。為了包圍對策委員會，PMC的兵力開始群湧而至。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 他们遇到的敌人就是凯萨PMC。为了包围对策委员会，PMC的兵力开始群涌而至。

desc.en: None is known about neither the identity nor the intents of these people. Ayane suddenly found out the there were signs of "Kaiser PMC (Private Military Company)" and everyone was shocked.

desc.zh_tw: 大家對這些人的歸屬與意圖都不明。這時綾音突然發現建築上有凱撒PMC（Private Military Company）的標誌，眾人吃了一驚。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 大家对这些人的归属与意图都不明。这时绫音突然发现建筑上有凯撒PMC（Private Military Company）的标志，众人吃了一惊。

desc.en: Ayane pointed out such military corporations, like PMC, are not the same as those gangsters like the Helmet Group. Nonomi suddenly remembered that there were some corporations hiring dropouts and bad students as mercenaries. It was at this time when everyone found that much troops were coming to them.

desc.zh_tw: 綾音指出PMC此類軍事公司與頭盔團那些小混混並不一樣。野乃美突然記起以前好像聽說有企業僱傭退學的和不良學生為僱傭兵。這時眾人突然發現大量兵力在朝他們湧來。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 绫音指出PMC此类军事公司与头盔团那些小混混并不一样。野宫突然记起以前好像听说有企业雇佣退学的和不良学生为雇佣兵。这时众人突然发现大量兵力在朝他们涌来。

desc.en: After joining up with Kaiser PMC, Hoshino defects when she learns that Abydos High School is under attack, but is then arrested by Black Suit. When all hope seems lost, Problem Solver 68 returns to Abydos to lend their aid to the Foreclosure Task Force.

desc.zh_tw: 抵達凱薩PMC的星野，聽到阿拜多斯高中正遭受攻擊的訊息後表示抗議，但卻反而被黑色西裝人拘禁。在千鈞一髮之際，先前離開的便利屋68一行人出現在阿拜多斯，幫了對策委員會一把。

desc.en: Kaiser Director arrived and everyone was immediately triggered. Though claiming that they would be reported to the General Student Council, the director said it was useless and the time just proved that no one could be helping them. The director even pointed out that, due to Hoshino's dropout, Abydos High School was no longer existed. Everyone was shocked, but still argued with the existence of "The Foreclosure Task Force" - however, accroding to Ayane, as it was established after the dissolution of the Student Union, the Task Force was in fact a club that hadn't recognized officially. As a result, neither could it represent the school, nor could it be proved to be existed.

desc.zh_tw: 凱撒理事聞聲走來，眾人對凱撒PMC的無理侵犯表示憤怒，但理事並沒有被嚇倒。雖然揚言要報告聯邦學生會，但理事表示聯邦學生會並沒有用，而且這麼長時間以來的事情也證明了沒人來幫助他們。理事直接指出，由於學生會成員星野退學，阿拜多斯已不復存在，眾人大驚。眾人以“對策委員會”尚存抗爭，但綾音表示，由於學生會當時已不存在，所以它並非官方認證的社團，因而實際上無法代表學校，也無法被證明存在。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 凯撒理事闻声走来，众人对凯撒PMC的无理侵犯表示愤怒，但理事并没有被吓倒。虽然扬言要报告联邦学生会，但理事表示联邦学生会并没有用，而且这么长时间以来的事情也证明了没人来帮助他们。理事直接指出，由于学生会成员星野退学，阿拜多斯已不复存在，众人大惊。众人以“对策委员会”尚存抗争，但绫音表示，由于学生会当时已不存在，所以它并非官方认证的社团，因而实际上无法代表学校，也无法被证明存在。

desc.en: Hoshino was in great shock upon hearing PMC were attacking Abydos. The Black Suit explained that, after her dropout, Abydos would no longer have a student belonging to the Student Union (i.e. no Student Union), and therefore the school would not exist. The Black suit expressed his interest on establishing a new school purposed by PMC, but then clarified that their goal was actually Hoshino herself. The fact of cooperating with Kaiser was simply because the interests weren't in conflict. The Black Suit said, as the highest "Mythic" in Kivotos, he would be carrying out experiments on her.

desc.zh_tw: 星野聽到PMC攻擊阿拜多斯時震驚無比。黑服向星野解釋，因為她自己退學，阿拜多斯就沒有了學生會成員（即沒有了學生會），由此學校已經不復存在。黑服表示了對PMC建立一所新學校的興趣，但隨後表示他們的目標實際上是星野自己，而與凱撒聯手僅僅是因為利益不衝突罷了。黑服表示，作為基沃託斯最高的“神祕”，他將會對她進行實驗。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 星野听到PMC攻击阿拜多斯时震惊无比。黑服向星野解释，因为她自己退学，阿拜多斯就没有了学生会成员（即没有了学生会），由此学校已经不复存在。黑服表示了对PMC建立一所新学校的兴趣，但随后表示他们的目标实际上是星野自己，而与凯撒联手仅仅是因为利益不冲突罢了。黑服表示，作为基沃托斯最高的“神秘”，他将会对她进行实验。

desc.en: Talks with Ako are unfruitful, leaving the situation as hostile as ever. The Foreclosure Task Force decides to team up with Problem Solver to take on the Prefect Team and their sizable forces.

desc.zh_tw: 由於和風紀委員會的亞子交涉不順利，以至於最後充滿敵對氣息。對策委員會決定與便利屋一行人合作，對抗具有壓倒性戰力的風紀委員會。

desc.en: The hard-fought battle was seemingly over until yet more members of the Prefect Team appeared. Just then, the head prefect, Hina, arrives and questions Ako about the entire series of events thus far.

desc.zh_tw: 好不容易結束了艱苦的戰鬥，但是風紀委員的數量又大為增加。那時，風紀委員長陽奈現身，針對此狀況責問亞子。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 好不容易结束了艰苦的战斗，但是风纪委员的数量又大为增加。那时，风纪委员长日奈现身，针对此状况责问亚子。

desc.en: Sensei suddenly made an eye contact with Haruka. Haruka squeezed a smile and then left in a hurry. Sensei also pretended not paying any attention.

desc.zh_tw: 老師突然將視線與遙香的對上了。遙香對老師笑了一下，然後匆匆離開。老師也假裝並無在意。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 老师突然将视线与遥香的对上了。遥香对老师笑了一下，然后匆匆离开。老师也假装并无在意。

desc.en: Ako first apologized for the attack launched by Prefect Team and hoped to transfer the Problem Solver 68 to them for further investigation, which was naturally rejected. Ayane argued with factual facts, yet Ako refused to take a step back. She said "It's probably because you have Schale's Sensei at your side."

desc.en: The negotiations ended badly and Ako decided to attack again. Yet the Prefect Team was suddenly assaulted by Haruka. Meanwhile, Kayoko began to gradually expose Ako's deception: the way that leading much troops to trouble in another district was definitely not Hina's doings, but in fact Ako's; the target was actually Schale, and it would make sense to lead extra troops.

desc.zh_tw: 談判破裂，亞子打算繼續攻擊。然而風紀委員會突然受到遙香的攻擊，同時佳代子也開始逐步拆穿亞子的騙局：帶大量兵力來其他自治區鬧事絕非陽奈所為，實際上是亞子自己出兵；目標實際上是夏萊，所以帶了額外兵力就在情理之中。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 谈判破裂，亚子打算继续攻击。然而风纪委员会突然受到遥香的攻击，同时佳代子也开始逐步拆穿亚子的骗局：带大量兵力来其他自治区闹事绝非日奈所为，实际上是亚子自己出兵；目标实际上是夏莱，所以带了额外兵力就在情理之中。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 谈判破裂，亚子打算继续攻击。然而对策委员会突然受到遥香的攻击，同时佳代子也开始逐步拆穿亚子的骗局：带大量兵力来其他自治区闹事绝非阳奈所为，实际上是亚子自己出兵；目标实际上是夏莱，所以带了额外兵力就在情理之中。

desc.en: Being exposed, Ako launched another attack without further ado, and declared everyone her own plan: as the Eden Treaty going to be signed, the Prefect Team worried that such organization would interfere the signing (the intel itself came from Trinity's Hifumi telling it to the Tea Party, which then was gotten on hand by Gehenna). As planned, they would first put Sensei under house arrest and then deal with Problem Solver 68.

desc.zh_tw: 亞子被拆穿後立刻發起了攻擊，並向所有人直接宣告了自己的計劃：由於伊甸條約簽署在即，風紀委員會擔心夏萊這樣的組織會干涉條約簽署（這一情報來源於三一的日步美將內容給了茶會，而茶會的情報又被格黑娜拿到手了），於是便打算先將老師軟禁在格黑娜，順帶處理便利屋68。

desc.en: Though defeated and many were retreating, but Ako didn't give up and launched attack again. Kayoko sensed that it was not the permission that Ako had, and something was absolutely wrong.

desc.zh_tw: 儘管戰敗且自家隊伍連連撤退，但亞子仍然沒有放棄，繼續向眾人發起攻擊。佳代子敏銳感覺到這並非亞子所擁有的調兵許可權，其中必有貓膩。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 尽管战败且自家队伍连连撤退，但亚子仍然没有放弃，继续向众人发起攻击。佳代子敏锐感觉到这并非亚子所拥有的调兵权限，其中必有猫腻。

desc.en: Ako was well aware of the risks but decided to proceed anyways. At this moment Hina connected onto the comm. Ako originally wanted to take "on patrol" as an excuse, but Hina had already understood most of it and came out in person.

desc.zh_tw: 亞子自己也知道其中的風險，但還是決定一意孤行。就在這時陽奈接入通訊，亞子本想以“巡邏”等藉口搪塞過去，但陽奈已經清楚了大部分事宜，並親自來到了現場。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 亚子自己也知道其中的风险，但还是决定一意孤行。就在这时日奈接入通讯，亚子本想以“巡逻”等借口搪塞过去，但日奈已经清楚了大部分事宜，并亲自来到了现场。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 亚子自己也知道其中的风险，但还是决定一意孤行。就在这时阳奈接入通讯，亚子本想以“巡逻”等借口搪塞过去，但阳奈已经清楚了大部分事宜，并亲自来到了现场。

desc.zh_tw: 接受[USERNAME]老師請求的陽奈和格黑娜風紀委員會一行人，助阿拜多斯對策委員會一臂之力與PMC士兵交戰。

desc.en: Sensei came to Gehenna and hoped to have a talk with Hina, but got intercepted by Iori. Iori said it was impossible, unless Sensei's willing to lick her feet - and Sensei did it without a second thought. Iori cursed at Sensei and they happened to meet Hina. Seeing Sensei kneeling down, Hina asked Sensei to rise. For some reasons, Iori mentioned about the licking stuff and Hina was in great shock immediately.

desc.zh_tw: 老師來到格黑娜，希望見到陽奈，但被伊織攔下，表示除非舔她的腳——老師二話不說直接跪舔。伊織對老師破口大罵，正好遇到陽奈。陽奈見老師跪地便讓老師起來，然而伊織不知為何提到了舔腳的事，陽奈大受震撼。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 老师来到格黑娜，希望见到日奈，但被伊织拦下，表示除非舔她的脚——老师二话不说直接跪舔。伊织对老师破口大骂，正好遇到日奈。日奈见老师跪地便让老师起来，然而伊织不知为何提到了舔脚的事，日奈大受震撼。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 老师来到格黑娜，希望见到阳奈，但被伊织拦下，表示除非舔她的脚——老师二话不说直接跪舔。伊织对老师破口大骂，正好遇到阳奈。阳奈见老师跪地便让老师起来，然而伊织不知为何提到了舔脚的事，阳奈大受震撼。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 老师来到格黑娜，希望见到阳奈，但被伊织拦下，表示除非舔她的脚——老师二话不说直接跪舔。伊织对老师破口大骂，正好遇到阳奈。阳奈见老师跪地便让老师起来，然而伊织不知为何提到了舔脚的事，阳奈大受震撼。

desc.en: Master Shiba opened a ramen cart at the side of the road and met the four of Problem Solver 68. Just like before, the boss gave four an extra-large bowl, except that this time, a bowl per man. After dining, Kayoko still held concerns about the battle. Yet with a fair budget, Aru said that they must go for it - though it's still, Aru pretending to be like that.

desc.zh_tw: 柴大將在路邊開了個小攤子，遇到便利屋68四人。同上次一樣，老闆給四個人盛了一大碗麵，只不過這次一人一碗。吃完後，佳代子對是否要參與戰鬥還有些疑慮，不過因為委託費給夠，亞瑠表示不得不去——不過仍然是強裝的罷了。

desc.en: Having taken too long, Akane and Karin escape their bonds, an event spelling disaster for the Game Development Department's mission. Just then, Aris comes to the rescue and succeeds in infiltrating the Student Council's contraband storage room.

desc.zh_tw: 因為耽誤到時間的關係，朱音和花凛也從封鎖中解放出來。就這樣，遊戲開發部又再次陷入危機。這時，愛麗絲及時現身解救遊戲開發部，讓一行人成功進入學生會扣押品保管所。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 因为耽误到时间的关系，茜和花凛也从封锁中解放出来。就这样，游戏开发部又再次陷入危机。这时，爱丽丝及时现身解救游戏开发部，让一行人成功进入学生会扣押品保管所。

desc.en: Yuuka put the confiscated robots into the battle. Asuna was tough to deal with. The Engineering Department failed to suppress the sniper Karin. Akane was on her way. At the seemingly hopeless moment, the Game Development Department remembered the meeting.

desc.zh_tw: 優香命令將收繳來的機器人加入戰場，明日奈的戰力也絕非等閒之輩，工程部無力壓制狙擊手花凜，朱音也正在趕來。在似乎無望之際，眾人想起了之前會議的內容。

desc.en: Yuuka and others finally arrived and announced that the GDD would be confined or suspended. Aris appeared suddenly and got rid of the barriers; Karin was re-suppressed as well. Aris mentioned that, in every RPG games she had played, the hero will never abandon friends. Encouraged, everyone started to engage.

desc.zh_tw: 優香等人終於到齊，宣佈了要把遊戲開發部關禁閉的處分。愛麗絲突然出現，以光之劍破除了障礙；花凜也被重新壓制。愛麗絲特別提到，在所有RPG遊戲中，勇者是從來不會放棄同伴的。受到鼓勵的眾人開始迎戰。

desc.en: In order to read the G.BIBLE, the Game Development Department needs to decrypt the password. To do so, they reach out to Veritas. Maki tells them they'll need the Mirror that was confiscated by the Student Council. To retrieve it, they'll need to get into the contraband storage guarded by the Maid Club.

Maki tells them they'll need the Mirror that was confiscated by the Student Council. To retrieve it, they'll need to get into the contraband storage guarded by the Maid Club.

desc.zh_tw: 遊戲開發部為了解讀暗號閱覽<G.Bible>而向<貝里塔斯>諮詢。真紀回答說，如果想解讀暗號，需要有被學生會扣押的駭客工具<鏡子>。一行人為了拿回<鏡子>，便前往由女僕部看守的學生會扣押品保管所。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 游戏开发部为了解读暗号阅览<G.Bible>而向<贝里塔斯>咨询。真纪回答说，如果想解读暗号，需要有被学生会扣押的骇客工具<镜子>。一行人为了拿回<镜子>，便前往由女仆部看守的学生会扣押品保管所。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 游戏开发部为了解读暗号阅览<G.Bible>而向<贝里塔斯>咨询。真纪回答说，如果想解读暗号，需要有被学生会扣押的骇客工具<镜子>。一行人为了拿回<镜子>，便前往由女仆部看守的学生会扣押品保管所。

desc.en: Hare from Veritas brought a bad news to everyone: Momoi's game saves could not be recovered. Momoi cried out after hearing this. Maki, by analyzing the file's metadata, confirmed its genuity, but was unable to crack the password.
desc.jp: Hare from Veritas brought a bad news to everyone: Momoi's game saves could not be recovered. Momoi cried out after hearing this. Maki, by analyzing the file's metadata, confirmed its genuity, but was unable to crack the password.

desc.zh_tw: 貝里塔斯的晴首先為大家帶來了壞消息：桃井的遊戲存檔不可恢復，桃井聽到立刻哭了起來。不過，真紀通過分析文件元數據，確認了文件的真實性，但卻無法破解密碼。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 贝里塔斯的晴首先为大家带来了坏消息：桃井的游戏存档不可恢复，桃井听到立刻哭了起来。不过，真纪通过分析文件元数据，确认了文件的真实性，但却无法破解密码。

desc.en: For Maki's reference, she thought that it is possible if they were just extracting the encrypted files rather than cracking the password. Yet a tool specifically designed to do so, called "Mirror", was confiscated by the Seminar recently. As a tool created by the president, Veritas intended to retrieve it back, which made an unexpected collision with the GDD. As a result, they purposed to raid Millennium's Seminar.
desc.jp: For Maki's reference, she thought that it is possible if they were just extracting the encrypted files rather than cracking the password. Yet a tool specifically designed to do so, called "Mirror", was confiscated by the Seminar recently. As a tool created by the president, Veritas intended to retrieve it back, which made an unexpected collision with the GDD. As a result, they purposed to raid Millennium's Seminar.

desc.zh_tw: 真紀認為，如果能直接提取出加密文件而不是破解密碼，應該還能行得通。然而一款正是照此設計的工具“鏡子”卻被學生會沒收。因為是部長製作的工具，貝里塔斯也打算將其取回——這與開發部眾人不謀而合，於是他們便提出要突襲千年學生會。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 真纪认为，如果能直接提取出加密文件而不是破解密码，应该还能行得通。然而一款正是照此设计的工具“镜子”却被学生会没收。因为是部长制作的工具，贝里塔斯也打算将其取回——这与开发部众人不谋而合，于是他们便提出要突袭千年学生会。

desc.en: Momoi still held her concern on whether participating or not, but Midori had already decided it: the GDD is an important place for everyone to gather and laugh, and she wanted to protect all of this. Having played more than 40 RPG games, Aris concluded that it's nothing more important than friends alongside in an adventure. Hare appreciated that and asked Sensei to let the Engineering Department join them as well.

desc.zh_tw: 桃井還對是否參與有所顧忌，但綠已經決定：遊戲開發部，是大家在一起的重要地方，她想要保護這一切。愛麗絲從玩過的四十多款RPG中得出結論，冒險路上最重要的是同行的伙伴。晴表示同意，並希望老師能夠去找工程師部一起行動。

desc.en: Akane was curious about the source of the intel, and Yuuka replied to her with a catty smile: Himari, the president of Veritas, told her directly.
desc.jp: Akane was curious about the source of the intel, and Yuuka replied to her with a catty smile: Himari, the president of Veritas, told her directly.

desc.zh_tw: 朱音好奇優香從何得知的消息，優香則狡猾地笑著表示，是貝里塔斯的部長陽葵告訴她的。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 茜好奇优香从何得知的消息，优香则狡猾地笑着表示，是贝里塔斯的部长日鞠告诉她的。

desc.en: Thanks to Aris, the Game Development Department easily defeats the hostile robots in the ruins this time.
desc.jp: Thanks to Aris, the Game Development Department easily defeats the hostile robots in the ruins this time.
desc.thai: Thanks to Aris, the Game Development Department easily defeats the hostile robots in the ruins this time.
desc.ko: Thanks to Aris, the Game Development Department easily defeats the hostile robots in the ruins this time.
desc.zh_tw: 這次和上次不同，由於愛麗絲的大展身手，遊戲開發部輕鬆打倒了廢墟的機器人後，朝向目的地前進。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 这次和上次不同，由于爱丽丝的大展身手，游戏开发部轻松打倒了废墟的机器人后，朝向目的地前进。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 这次和上次不同，由于爱丽丝的大展身手，游戏开发部轻松打倒了废墟的机器人后，朝向目的地前进。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 这次和上次不同，由于爱丽丝的大展身手，游戏开发部轻松打倒了废墟的机器人后，朝向目的地前进。

desc.en: Outside the factory, everyone was met with fierce attack from the robots. Midori wanted to retreat but was rejected by Momoi. She thought that the robots would eventually gather and made the situation far worse than now. Encouraged by Aris and Momoi, everyone decided to engage.
desc.jp: Outside the factory, everyone was met with fierce attack from the robots. Midori wanted to retreat but was rejected by Momoi. She thought that the robots would eventually gather and made the situation far worse than now. Encouraged by Aris and Momoi, everyone decided to engage.
desc.thai: Outside the factory, everyone was met with fierce attack from the robots. Midori wanted to retreat but was rejected by Momoi. She thought that the robots would eventually gather and made the situation far worse than now. Encouraged by Aris and Momoi, everyone decided to engage.
desc.ko: Outside the factory, everyone was met with fierce attack from the robots. Midori wanted to retreat but was rejected by Momoi. She thought that the robots would eventually gather and made the situation far worse than now. Encouraged by Aris and Momoi, everyone decided to engage.
desc.zh_tw: 在工廠外，眾人遭到了機器人的猛烈進攻。綠提出撤退，但被桃井否決，認為機器人最終會聚集過來，使情況雪上加霜。在愛麗絲與桃井的鼓勵下，眾人最終決定應戰。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 在工厂外，众人遭到了机器人的猛烈进攻。绿提出撤退，但被桃井否决，认为机器人最终会聚集过来，使情况雪上加霜。在爱丽丝与桃井的鼓励下，众人最终决定应战。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 在工厂外，众人遭到了机器人的猛烈进攻。绿提出撤退，但被桃井否决，认为机器人最终会聚集过来，使情况雪上加霜。在爱丽丝与桃井的鼓励下，众人最终决定应战。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 在工厂外，众人遭到了机器人的猛烈进攻。绿提出撤退，但被桃井否决，认为机器人最终会聚集过来，使情况雪上加霜。在爱丽丝与桃井的鼓励下，众人最终决定应战。

desc.en: Aris took the role as forceful breakthrough girl, but was arrested at last. Akane expressed her liking towards Aris. Yuuka suddenly realized the trap in it, and enjoined the subordinate to replace the security system with the ones that were not from the Engineering Department.
desc.jp: Aris took the role as forceful breakthrough girl, but was arrested at last. Akane expressed her liking towards Aris. Yuuka suddenly realized the trap in it, and enjoined the subordinate to replace the security system with the ones that were not from the Engineering Department.

desc.en: During the meeting held two hours ago, Hare mentioned that the only way to access the Contraband Room would be the lifts. Yet both the lifts and the doors on the top floor should only be verified by fingerprints, and failed to verify that would also trigger multiple mechanisms. In order to break through the security system, Hibiki proposed to disable the system for a while, and by that means the Veritas would be able to start hacking.

Yet both the lifts and the doors on the top floor should only be verified by fingerprints, and failed to verify that would also trigger multiple mechanisms. In order to break through the security system, Hibiki proposed to disable the system for a while, and by that means the Veritas would be able to start hacking.

desc.zh_tw: 兩小時前的作戰會議中，晴提到到達保管所的地方唯有通過電梯到達，然而電梯和頂樓各區域的門只能通過指紋驗證，且驗證失敗還會觸發多種機關。為了突破安全系統，響提出用EMP手雷癱瘓所有系統，到時貝里塔斯即可開始駭入。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 两小时前的作战会议中，晴提到到达保管所的地方唯有通过电梯到达，然而电梯和顶楼各区域的门只能通过指纹验证，且验证失败还会触发多种机关。为了突破安全系统，响提出用EMP手雷瘫痪所有系统，到时贝里塔斯即可开始骇入。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 两小时前的作战会议中，晴提到到达保管所的地方唯有通过电梯到达，然而电梯和顶楼各区域的门只能通过指纹验证，且验证失败还会触发多种机关。为了突破安全系统，响提出用EMP手雷瘫痪所有系统，到时贝里塔斯即可开始骇入。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 两小时前的作战会议中，晴提到到达保管所的地方唯有通过电梯到达，然而电梯和顶楼各区域的门只能通过指纹验证，且验证失败还会触发多种机关。为了突破安全系统，响提出用EMP手雷瘫痪所有系统，到时贝里塔斯即可开始骇入。

desc.en: Momoi and Midori was at the lift, while Akane and others were locked up together due to the unmatched fingerprints. Yuuka realized the trap set by Aris too late. Momoi, Midori and Sensei arrived at the floor and successfully unlocked with their own fingerprints, yet they were met with other Seminar members.

desc.zh_tw: 桃井和綠到達了電梯前，與此同時朱音等人卻因指紋不符而被一同關了起來。這時優香才意識到愛麗絲的問題，而桃井、綠與老師三人已經到達頂樓，並順利用指紋開鎖，但還是遇到了學生會成員。

desc.en: The Game Development Department submits Tales Saga Chronicle 2 just before their deadline. Right after it uploads, the club room suddenly becomes the target of a shootout.
desc.jp: The Game Development Department submits Tales Saga Chronicle 2 just before their deadline. Right after it uploads, the club room suddenly becomes the target of a shootout.
desc.thai: The Game Development Department submits Tales Saga Chronicle 2 just before their deadline. Right after it uploads, the club room suddenly becomes the target of a shootout.
desc.ko: The Game Development Department submits Tales Saga Chronicle 2 just before their deadline. Right after it uploads, the club room suddenly becomes the target of a shootout.
desc.zh_tw: 遊戲開發部一行人勉強趕上截止期限，完成了<傳說年代記2>的開發。上傳遊戲後，遊戲開發部社團活動室遭到來歷不明的槍擊。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 游戏开发部一行人勉强赶上截止期限，完成了<传说年代记2>的开发。上传游戏后，游戏开发部社团活动室遭到来历不明的枪击。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 游戏开发部一行人勉强赶上截止期限，完成了<传说年代记2>的开发。上传游戏后，游戏开发部社团活动室遭到来历不明的枪击。

desc.en: The shooter was Neru, the president of the Maid Club. Claiming that her last battle with Aris had piqued her interest, Neru challenges Aris to a fight. One destructive battle later, and Neru, satisfied, goes on her way.
desc.jp: The shooter was Neru, the president of the Maid Club. Claiming that her last battle with Aris had piqued her interest, Neru challenges Aris to a fight. One destructive battle later, and Neru, satisfied, goes on her way.
desc.thai: The shooter was Neru, the president of the Maid Club. Claiming that her last battle with Aris had piqued her interest, Neru challenges Aris to a fight. One destructive battle later, and Neru, satisfied, goes on her way.
desc.ko: The shooter was Neru, the president of the Maid Club. Claiming that her last battle with Aris had piqued her interest, Neru challenges Aris to a fight. One destructive battle later, and Neru, satisfied, goes on her way.
desc.zh_tw: 對社團活動室發動槍擊的，是女僕部的部長寧瑠。寧瑠說對上次的戰鬥大感興趣，並對愛麗絲提出挑戰。經過好一陣混戰才滿足地回去。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 对社团活动室发动枪击的，是女仆部的部长尼禄。尼禄说对上次的战斗大感兴趣，并对爱丽丝提出挑战。经过好一阵混战才满足地回去。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 对社团活动室发动枪击的，是女仆部的部长宁瑠。宁瑠说对上次的战斗大感兴趣，并对爱丽丝提出挑战。经过好一阵混战才满足地回去。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 对社团活动室发动枪击的，是女仆部的部长宁瑠。宁瑠说对上次的战斗大感兴趣，并对爱丽丝提出挑战。经过好一阵混战才满足地回去。

desc.en: The GDD finally finished it at the very last moment. Momoi uploaded the demo for everyone to download. The comments started flowing in, as the download counter counting fast. When everyone was worried and nervous, the club room was hit by some bullet shots. Everyone began to engage.
desc.jp: The GDD finally finished it at the very last moment. Momoi uploaded the demo for everyone to download. The comments started flowing in, as the download counter counting fast. When everyone was worried and nervous, the club room was hit by some bullet shots. Everyone began to engage.
desc.thai: The GDD finally finished it at the very last moment. Momoi uploaded the demo for everyone to download. The comments started flowing in, as the download counter counting fast. When everyone was worried and nervous, the club room was hit by some bullet shots. Everyone began to engage.
desc.ko: The GDD finally finished it at the very last moment. Momoi uploaded the demo for everyone to download. The comments started flowing in, as the download counter counting fast. When everyone was worried and nervous, the club room was hit by some bullet shots. Everyone began to engage.
desc.zh_tw: 開發部眾人終於在最後一刻完成了作品，桃井提出要將demo上傳到網上供大家下載。評論開始湧來，下載量也在激增，而就在眾人緊張不安時，社團突然被幾發炮彈擊中。眾人開始迎戰。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 开发部众人终于在最后一刻完成了作品，桃井提出要将demo上传到网上供大家下载。评论开始涌来，下载量也在激增，而就在众人紧张不安时，社团突然被几发炮弹击中。众人开始迎战。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 开发部众人终于在最后一刻完成了作品，桃井提出要将demo上传到网上供大家下载。评论开始涌来，下载量也在激增，而就在众人紧张不安时，社团突然被几发炮弹击中。众人开始迎战。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 开发部众人终于在最后一刻完成了作品，桃井提出要将demo上传到网上供大家下载。评论开始涌来，下载量也在激增，而就在众人紧张不安时，社团突然被几发炮弹击中。众人开始迎战。

desc.en: Neru came and challenged the GDD. Neru praised for Yuzu's courage at first, then challenged Aris into a battle. She claimed that if Aris could defeat her, then everything from the past would no longer be investigated. Before she could react, Aris fired the Sword of Light in advance.

desc.en: While wandering around campus, Aris runs into Sumire, who is out on a jog. The two of them bond over being both comrades in arms as well as sports. As Aris continues her adventure, she runs into Asuna and Karin in their school uniforms off campus, and she invites them to join her party. That moment, Aris learns that Neru is looking for her and quickly takes off to another location.

As Aris continues her adventure, she runs into Asuna and Karin in their school uniforms off campus, and she invites them to join her party. That moment, Aris learns that Neru is looking for her and quickly takes off to another location.

desc.zh_tw: 愛麗絲在校園移動的過程中，遇見了正在慢跑的堇。兩人互相認為對方是同伴和運動夥伴，而後愛麗絲為了繼續進行冒險而離開。愛麗絲在校外遇見了穿著校服的明日奈和花凜，她向兩人提議下次一起去冒險，並且邀請兩人加入隊伍。聽到寧瑠在找愛麗絲的訊息後，愛麗絲立刻前往其他地方。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 爱丽丝在校园移动的过程中，遇见了正在慢跑的堇。两人互相认为对方是同伴和运动伙伴，而后爱丽丝为了继续进行冒险而离开。爱丽丝在校外遇见了穿着校服的明日奈和花凛，她向两人提议下次一起去冒险，并且邀请两人加入队伍。听到尼禄在找爱丽丝的消息后，爱丽丝立刻前往其他地方。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 爱丽丝在校园移动的过程中，遇见了正在慢跑的堇。两人互相认为对方是同伴和运动伙伴，而后爱丽丝为了继续进行冒险而离开。爱丽丝在校外遇见了穿着校服的明日奈和花凛，她向两人提议下次一起去冒险，并且邀请两人加入队伍。听到宁瑠在找爱丽丝的消息后，爱丽丝立刻前往其他地方。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 爱丽丝在校园移动的过程中，遇见了正在慢跑的堇。两人互相认为对方是同伴和运动伙伴，而后爱丽丝为了继续进行冒险而离开。爱丽丝在校外遇见了穿着校服的明日奈和花凛，她向两人提议下次一起去冒险，并且邀请两人加入队伍。听到宁瑠在找爱丽丝的消息后，爱丽丝立刻前往其他地方。

desc.en: Walking in the campus, Aris and Sensei came to the Track & Field area. Aris heard a strange noise suddenly, and thought it was a "Random Enemy Encounter" event. It turned out to be Sumire. Sumire and Aris exchanged some benefits on sports and exercises.
desc.jp: Walking in the campus, Aris and Sensei came to the Track & Field area. Aris heard a strange noise suddenly, and thought it was a "Random Enemy Encounter" event. It turned out to be Sumire. Sumire and Aris exchanged some benefits on sports and exercises.
desc.thai: Walking in the campus, Aris and Sensei came to the Track & Field area. Aris heard a strange noise suddenly, and thought it was a "Random Enemy Encounter" event. It turned out to be Sumire. Sumire and Aris exchanged some benefits on sports and exercises.

desc.zh_tw: 愛麗絲和老師在校園走著，來到了田徑跑道。愛麗絲突然聽見了奇怪的聲音，認為是“遇敵事件”，結果原來是堇。堇和愛麗絲交談了幾句，互相交換了關於運動的好處之類。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 爱丽丝和老师在校园走着，来到了田径跑道。爱丽丝突然听见了奇怪的声音，认为是“遇敌事件”，结果原来是堇。堇和爱丽丝交谈了几句，互相交换了关于运动的好处之类。

desc.en: Aris believed that the further the location, the more events would occur. And indeed they met C&C members Asuna and Karin, who were just on special missions. They exchanged a few and at last Karin mentioned that Neru was looking for Aris.

desc.en: Sensei pays the Game Development Department a visit for the first time in a while. The members are fielding ideas for the development of their next project, but get distracted watching Aris playing a video game. Aris struggles mid-game upon encountering a cheating player, but gains a dramatic victory thanks to Yuzu's exhilarating performance. However, they fail to make any progress on plans for their next project, and decide to try again tomorrow.

However, they fail to make any progress on plans for their next project, and decide to try again tomorrow.

desc.zh_tw: 老師久違地前往遊戲開發部部室。成員們為了研發下一部作品而集思廣益，但不知不覺卻變成了觀看愛麗絲玩遊戲。愛麗絲在遊戲過程中遇見作弊玩家並陷入苦戰，但因為柚子活躍的表現而獲得戲劇般的勝利。但下一部作品的企劃沒有任何進展，生活就和平常沒有兩樣。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 老师久违地前往游戏开发部部室。成员们为了研发下一部作品而集思广益，但不知不觉却变成了观看爱丽丝玩游戏。爱丽丝在游戏过程中遇见作弊玩家并陷入苦战，但因为柚子活跃的表现而获得戏剧般的胜利。但下一部作品的企划没有任何进展，生活就和平常没有两样。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 老师久违地前往游戏开发部部室。成员们为了研发下一部作品而集思广益，但不知不觉却变成了观看爱丽丝玩游戏。爱丽丝在游戏过程中遇见作弊玩家并陷入苦战，但因为柚子活跃的表现而获得戏剧般的胜利。但下一部作品的企划没有任何进展，生活就和平常没有两样。

desc.en: Sensei was invited to the Game Development Club, but somehow started playing fighting games with Momoi. Momoi wanted to continue playing, but was stopped by his sister Midori; it was at this time when Sensei got the know that he was invited to come up with new ideas for their next games.
desc.jp: Sensei was invited to the Game Development Club, but somehow started playing fighting games with Momoi. Momoi wanted to continue playing, but was stopped by his sister Midori; it was at this time when Sensei got the know that he was invited to come up with new ideas for their next games.

desc.zh_tw: 老師受邀來到遊戲開發部，但不知不覺中就和桃井玩起了格鬥遊戲。桃井想繼續和老師玩下去，被妹妹綠攔了下來；這時老師才知道，桃井邀請他來是為了想出下一部遊戲的好點子。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 老师受邀来到游戏开发部，但不知不觉中就和桃井玩起了格斗游戏。桃井想继续和老师玩下去，被妹妹绿拦了下来；这时老师才知道，桃井邀请他来是为了想出下一部游戏的好点子。

desc.zh_tw: 桃井指出剛剛之所以玩遊戲，正是為了試圖分析並從中獲得一些靈感。桃井的想法是將多種不同風格與型別的遊戲結合到一起，希望能夠藉由此種異類作品斬獲千年大獎。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 桃井指出刚刚之所以玩游戏，正是为了试图分析并从中获得一些灵感。桃井的想法是将多种不同风格与类型的游戏结合到一起，希望能够藉由此种异类作品斩获千年大奖。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 桃井指出刚刚之所以玩游戏，正是为了试图分析并从中获得一些灵感。桃井的想法是将多种不同风格与类型的游戏结合到一起，希望能够藉由此种异类作品斩获千年大奖。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 桃井指出刚刚之所以玩游戏，正是为了试图分析并从中获得一些灵感。桃井的想法是将多种不同风格与类型的游戏结合到一起，希望能够藉由此种异类作品斩获千年大奖。

desc.en: Himari maintained her own conclusion, and a disagreement took place. Rio tried to trap Himari with her AMAS, but Himari hacked the room and her AMAS and escaped successfully.
desc.jp: Himari maintained her own conclusion, and a disagreement took place. Rio tried to trap Himari with her AMAS, but Himari hacked the room and her AMAS and escaped successfully.
desc.thai: Himari maintained her own conclusion, and a disagreement took place. Rio tried to trap Himari with her AMAS, but Himari hacked the room and her AMAS and escaped successfully.
desc.ko: Himari maintained her own conclusion, and a disagreement took place. Rio tried to trap Himari with her AMAS, but Himari hacked the room and her AMAS and escaped successfully.
desc.zh_tw: 陽葵固守著自己的結論，與莉央產生了嚴重分歧。莉央試圖用AMAS將陽葵困住，但陽葵輕鬆駭入了房間和AMAS的系統，逃出了房間。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 日鞠固守着自己的结论，与莉央产生了严重分歧。莉央试图用AMAS将日鞠困住，但日鞠轻松骇入了房间和AMAS的系统，逃出了房间。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 阳葵固守着自己的结论，与莉央产生了严重分歧。莉央试图用AMAS将阳葵困住，但阳葵轻松骇入了房间和AMAS的系统，逃出了房间。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 阳葵固守着自己的结论，与莉央产生了严重分歧。莉央试图用AMAS将阳葵困住，但阳葵轻松骇入了房间和AMAS的系统，逃出了房间。

desc.en:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.

desc.zh_cn:
蔚蓝档案OST的第十七首曲子，常在“商店”页播放，也是优香回忆大厅的主题曲。
曲子的标题在日语中意为“欢迎”，即当你走进一家商店或餐厅时所会听到的问候语。

desc.en: Himari came to the corridor outside the room, talking to herself and making fun on how stubborn Rio was. But right at this moment Himari was firmly controlled by an unknown person - the fifth C&C member who existed only in rumors before.
desc.jp: Himari came to the corridor outside the room, talking to herself and making fun on how stubborn Rio was. But right at this moment Himari was firmly controlled by an unknown person - the fifth C&C member who existed only in rumors before.
desc.thai: Himari came to the corridor outside the room, talking to herself and making fun on how stubborn Rio was. But right at this moment Himari was firmly controlled by an unknown person - the fifth C&C member who existed only in rumors before.
desc.ko: Himari came to the corridor outside the room, talking to herself and making fun on how stubborn Rio was. But right at this moment Himari was firmly controlled by an unknown person - the fifth C&C member who existed only in rumors before.
desc.zh_tw: 陽葵來到房間外的走廊，自言自語笑話著莉央的固執。然而這時陽葵卻被一位不明人士——傳說中的第五位C&C成員——所牢牢控制住。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 日鞠来到房间外的走廊，自言自语笑话着莉央的固执。然而这时日鞠却被一位不明人士——传说中的第五位C&C成员——所牢牢控制住。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 阳葵来到房间外的走廊，自言自语笑话着莉央的固执。然而这时阳葵却被一位不明人士——传说中的第五位C&C成员——所牢牢控制住。
